title: CES 2017 - Klipsch The Fifteens Speaker
description:
Abt Electronics talks to Klipsch about their upcoming speaker, The Fifteens.

Blending timeless elements of real wood veneer, tactile spun-copper controls, a wide-baffle cabinet and mid-century modern design, the new Heritage Wireless The Fifteens powered large-format floor standing speakers completely redefine the audiophile experience. Featuring 180 watts per channel built-in custom amplification with a 192kHz / 24-bit DAC, 15” woofers and 1 3/4” horn-loaded tweeters – The Fifteens deliver auditory ecstasy. Including a built-in phono pre-amp, plus optical digital, USB Audio, RCA and Bluetooth® inputs– you can enjoy the purity of sound from virtually any source without the hassle of a complicated setup. 

A pair of powered floorstanding speakers “When designing The Fifteens, we took cues from the 1930’s and the result is a pair of romantically nostalgic floorstanding speakers with a distinct wide baffle and large format sound,” said Steve Jain, VP and general manager, Klipsch. “The Fifteens completely redefine the audiophile experience with a design nod to the past and the latest technology.”

Learn more at http://www.klipsch.com/ces-2017
